Bowser, albeit having a mortal weakness of plumbers, is pretty incredible. He can grow to hundreds of times the size of Hulk; breathe fire, yes, and has an indestructible shell. That shell has never, ever been broken and is an ultimate defense. He can summon boulders, create planets, and galaxies, rules over thousands of armies of several minions, can create waves of plasma, and really would be the all-powerful tyrant if he wasn't so dull-witted. If he was smart enough to fully utilize his power, Bowser would crush the Hulk. Here, it's stupidity that incapacitated him.

Hulk: A rampaging behemoth who overpowers gods, mutants, and giants.
Bowser: A slow, giant turtle who shoots fireballs and constantly loses to a plumber addicted to drugs.
So you have a guy who has limitless strength and durability versus a guy who get beat buy a plumber every game.
Goku or Gohan would destroy the Hulk.
Even though Bowser is my ultimate favorite character from childhood, and still is my favorite, Hulk would hand Bowsers ass to him, take it back, then shove it down his throat.

The only reason bowser keeps losing against Mario is because of his incredibly stupid castle designs. I mean, if he removed that button/axe that removes the ground below him Mario would totally lose. With it, he only needs to get past bowser and not actually fight him.

Even if Hulk healed not 4x but 40x as fast then an average human, it would not be enough to stop Bowser from burning him. It takes at most half an hour to burn someone to death (and I am being veeeeeery generous), and after like 20 (0.5 * 40) hours burn wounds are not healed. Still, he could take Bowser by surprise, from behind, and rip him apart not getting anywhere near the fire breath.
